title: @Riot Death Sworn Ward
body:
This is rather embarassing but I just...I don't have an excuse I was 100% not paying attention and accidentally disenchanted my death sworn ward skin shard thinking I was unlocking it when I saw the number of orange essence. Is there any sort of way this can be reversed or is it gone forever?

{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
Alright I'll go ahead and do that now. Fingers crossed and thanks for the reply.

 {{sticker:vlad-salute}}
